subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Boyle had a goal and an assist as the Rangers won for the 12th time in 13 games, defeating the Kings in the teams’ first meeting since Los Angeles’s victory in last season’s finals.
snippet: Boyle had a goal and an assist as the Rangers won for the 12th time in 13 games, defeating the Kings in the teams’ first meeting since Los Angeles’s victory in last season’s finals.
